description: Detects potential NT API stub patching as seen used by the project PatchingAPI
author: frack113
name: Potential NT API Stub Patching
query: ((winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:"0x1FFFFF" AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:C\:\\Windows\\SYSTEM32\\ntdll.dll\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*|UNKNOWN\(* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*\)) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*))) OR ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\asgard2\-agent\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\thor\\thor64.exe)))))
